phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Apotheosis for the three Evas will be performed
as soon as the MAGI system is reactivated.
You are fast, Maya, that is what makes you you!
Wait a second, A-8 would be faster there.
Are you finished giving the MAGI their check-up?
As promised, it will be over before today's test begins.
You have three impossible tasks, yet you still beat the schedule.
All three MAGI systems have entered self-diagnostic mode.
The 127th routine maintenance has been completed.
Take a break until the test begins.
As usual, mother's in good shape, but...
Is it just me getting older?
You want me to take off my clothes again?
The next chamber is an ultra-clean room environment.
Just taking a shower and changing your undergarments is insufficient.
Why do I have to go through all this for a simple autopilot test?
With the advance of time, Eva technology also needs to advance.
To do so, we need a constant influx of new data.
All right, I am here, just the way you wanted.
Butt-naked and run through the wash cycle seventeen times.
Now, I want all three of you to stay that way
as you walk through the room and board the entry plug.
The video recorders have been shut off.
This is a very personal thing!
This test's purpose is to remove interference from your plug suits,
and monitor the harmonics directly from your bodies.
But I do not want anybody peeking, okay?
All pilots are ready for entry.
Connecting simulation bodies to the system.
The simulation plugs are now under the MAGI's control.
It is hard to believe that the first experiment took a whole week.
According to the schedule, the test will end in three hours.
Yes, it is different from the other times.
Something is wrong with my senses.
My right arm is all I can feel clearly.
Rei, imagine moving your right hand.
Return the MAGI to their normal state.
You can sure feel the creator's personality, cannot you?
You created them, did not you?
You do not know anything, do you?
That is because you never talk about yourself like I do, Ritsuko!
I just created the system uplinks.
The one who developed the basic theorems and the main frame
These are the parts that were brought in three days ago.
These are the parts that are showing signs of deterioration.
With magnification, you can see some of the spots.
Can you tell me what it is?
It is got to be corrosion.
Can you tell me what it is?
It is got to be corrosion.
There are slight variations in the temperature and conduction rates.
Deterioration of sterilized rooms happens a lot, an awful lot lately.
The construction schedule was cut by about sixty days.
It is possible that some air bubbles may have gotten inside.
There are a lot of flaws in the construction of B Wing.
This building was built after the Angels appeared, remember?
Take care of it by tomorrow.
Otherwise, Ikari will be jumping all over our asses for it.
No, it is some kind of corrosion in the protein wall above this floor.
Could it have any effect on this test?
We cannot abort experiments due to minor technical problems.
Otherwise, Commander Ikari will be jumping all over our asses.
Connecting the simulation plugs to the Evas via the simulation bodies.
Contact with Eva Unit 00 has been confirmed.
AT Field will be generated on two.
We have got a contamination alert in the Sigma unit on A Floor.
The 87th protein wall is corroding and releasing heat.
We have detected an abnormality in the 6th pipe as well.
Corrosion of the protein wall is increasing at an incredible rate!
Corrosion is spreading along the walls.
It is invading the simulation bodies' active water system.
You let an Angel get inside?
This is not the time for excuses.
I want a physical shut down of Central Dogma.
Initiating physical shut down of Central Dogma.
What the hell are you doing?
Isolating Sigma Unit from B Floor.
This is a malfunction, an error in the alarm system.
Report that to both the Japanese government and the committee.
The contaminated area is still descending.
It is spreading all over Sigma Unit from the Pribnow Box!
Yes, it is too close to Adam.
Yes, it is too close to Adam.
Stop the corrosion within Sigma Unit!
If necessary, sacrifice the Geo Front.
We can launch them as soon as the pilots are recovered.
There is no need to wait for the pilots.
Sacrifice the other two if necessary.
But Sir, we cannot destroy the Angel without the Evas.
If the Evas are contaminated first, we will be finished.
All of Central Dogma under Sigma Unit
will be shut down in sixty seconds.
will be shut down in sixty seconds.
Thirty seconds until activation of vacuum pump.
Thirty seconds until activation of vacuum pump.
Central Dogma has been completely sealed.
Mega-depth facilities are entirely occupied by the intruder.
Well now, how will we fight off an Angel without an Eva?
Look, this is the border between the normal and heavy water.
There is a higher level of oxygen here.
The place where ozone is vented in
to maintain aseptic conditions is not contaminated.
So does that mean that its weakness is ozone?
Zero A and Zero B seem to be recovering.
The area around the pipes is getting back to normal.
The central portion is proving a little more difficult.
The contaminated area is spreading again.
The ozone is no longer having any effect.
Now it is absorbing the ozone.
Something is hacking into the sub-computer.
Something is hacking into the sub-computer.
The intruder has not been identified.
T-minus eighteen seconds to completion of trace.
T-minus eighteen seconds to completion of trace.
No human being could do this.
The hacker is inside this facility!
It is in B-Wing, in the Pribnow Box!
Those glowing lines look like electronic circuits.
This is just like a computer.
Negative, it refuses to accept the command.
It is generating an AT Field.
It is generating an AT Field.
It is accessing the main security bank.
It is cracking the pass code.
It is broken into the main banks!
It is reading the main bank.
It is going after the MAGI!
The Angel is intruding further into the computers.
It is made contact with Melchior.
The Angel is taking over Melchior.
Melchior is being re-programmed by the Angel.
Change synchronization code to every fifteen seconds.
How much time did we buy?
At least two hours, I think.
The MAGI have become our enemy.
This Angel must be composed of a group of micro-machines,
each the size of a virus.
These micro-machines group together to form colonies.
In a very short period of time, they have exponentially evolved
to form a sophisticated intelligence circuit.
to form the best system to cope with any environment.
That is their survival mechanism as a life form.
Against an enemy that evolves to overcome its weaknesses
the only effective counter measure is to eliminate the host
and let the parasite die with it.
The only option is to order the MAGI to commit suicide.
I propose the physical elimination of the MAGI.
Destroying the MAGI means destroying headquarters itself.
Then I officially request it on behalf of the Operations Division.
This is a matter for the Technology Department.
Why are you being so mule-headed?!
This situation is a result of my carelessness.
Why do you always have to be like this?
You always take the responsibility on your own shoulders
As long as this Angel keeps evolving, we have a chance.
The end of evolution is self-destruction.
Thus, we just need to accelerate its evolution.
If the Angel considers it the only practical means of survival,
it may choose to co-exist with the MAGI system.
If the Angel is a computer itself,
we can counter-hack it by connecting Casper to the Angel
and uploading a self-destruct program, but...
At the same time, we will be turning off the barrier to the Angel.
So either Casper or the Angel, whichever is faster, will win.
Will the program be ready in time?
Will the program be ready in time?
If Casper is taken over first, it will all be over.
An emergency has occurred in NERV Headquarters.
These are notes left by the developer.
It is like a special map to all of the MAGI's back doors.
Am I allowed to see these?
With these we can program much faster than we thought!
Does not this remind you of our college days?
Hey, how about telling me about the MAGI?
Do you know about personality transplant OS?
Yes, it is for implanting an individual's personality
into a seventh generation computer so it can think.
The same technology is used for operating the Evas.
I have heard MAGI's programming used one of the first test subjects.
So, it was her personality that was transplanted?
In a very real sense, these brains are my mother.
Is that why you wanted to protect the MAGI?
I did not really like my mom.
This was a decision as a scientist.
The self-destruct sequence has been initiated by the computer.
Destruct will be triggered twenty seconds after all three AI consent.
Destruct will be triggered twenty seconds after all three AI consent.
Destruction will encompass Geoid Depth -280, -140 and Floor 0.
Balthasar is now invading Casper!...of two computers to cancel the action.
It is faster than us!...of two computers to cancel the action.
Casper will be taken over in eighteen seconds.
Casper will be taken over in eighteen seconds.
I have got almost one whole second to spare.
At least it is not a zero or a minus.
At least it is not a zero or a minus.
Self-destruct has been canceled by the computer.
The MAGI are returning to normal mode.
The red alert has been canceled.
The red alert has been canceled.
All hands return to first stage alert.
All hands return to first stage alert.
Jeez, I cannot get out with no clothes on!
T-minus zero three to MAGI reactivation.
Staying up for these all-nighters is rough.
This is the first time I have ever really appreciated your coffee.
The night before she died, my mother told me
that the MAGI are three aspects of herself.
The three aspects of her struggle for dominance inside the MAGI.
She intentionally implanted the dilemmas of human experience.
Actually, each of the three programs are slightly different.
I do not think I will ever be a mother,
and I do not really understand her as a mother.
I respected her as a scientist.
However, as a woman, I hated her.
Casper contains the program of her as a woman.
She stayed a woman to the last.
NERV and Seele manage the Human Instrumentality Project behind the scenes.
They will revise the present and the future of NERV.
Are all the incidents simply just a realization of a given scenario?
Next time: Seele, Throne of the Soul
